title: We're AVANT GARDE - Ask us anything!
body:
Hi guys, 

We're AVANT GARDE and we are here to answer your questions!
Please put any questions you have for us here and we will answer as many as we can between 6pm and 7pm!

Joining us today is: 
Top: Ceres
Jungle: Chelby
Middle: Triplecheese
Marksman: Blinky
Support: Jayke
Coach: Pinch

You can find out more about AVANT on our social media: 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/avantgaming/
Twitter: www.twitter.com/avantgaming
Website: www.avantgaming.com.au

Thanks!

replies.body: @Blinky OPL ADC Rankings?

Honest answer! including supports
1. Raes
2. k1ng
3. Lost
4. Myself
5. Fbi
6. Pecake
7. Raid
8. Crazyee
3. Raes
honest

Any secret champs you are going to play this Saturday?  What can we expect from your draft? 

Thanks in advance
Wukong mid lane
For jayke who do you like more out of fesh and prae?
easiest decision i've made all day, jordan "praelus" fernandez by far
Is it true that Jayke once flew to NZ to sleep on a Lazyboy chair for 48 hours and get demolished at minigolf?
there is no hard evidence for this claim therefor it is dismissed.
Yes, it happened!
Who has the 'fatest' arms {{summoner:14}}
fattest*

A lot of people were surprised by the whole Maxibon thing.

Are Maxibon backing Avant financially, or is this like a peripheral partnership where they mainly just supply you with a constant stream of their product?

Being paid in maxibons doesn't sound too bad....
All I know is that we get the ice cream!

I have a question for everyone:
Ceres - How does it feel knowing that pinch can draft you onto maokai at any given time?
Chelby - Hello!
Triple - Why are you so confident in your ability to carry as corki at any given time?
Blinky - Your Response to the Blinky Traps meme?
Jayke - Woof!
Pinch - How does it feel knowing that one of the best top laners on the server is a Charlie Wraith Enthusiast?
Thanks for answering my questions much love <3 <3 <3
fuck you cameron

Under the assumption this isn't a meme, the reason why I was confident in my ability on Corki was because our practice showed good results on the specific Corki + Ivern composition. Unfortunately my on-stage performance proved otherwise!
I'm yet to meet anybody who isn't a Charlie Wraith Enthusiast
@jayke Thoughts on Chazz It Up and iSupervise dogging the boys?
i think that they both did what was best for their careers, and you should be happy for them, but fuckin hell they dogged the boys hella hard
no vulgar language pls i used to look up 2 u but now i h8 u sry bye
What is ceres and chelby's fav hentai?
AV life
Kentai
What split do you think BigDogTim will replace Blinky?
as soon as you turn 17 the job is yours buddy
@Triplecheese Hi, what ATAR did you get?
84.05... An absolute disaster compared to my cohort!
How is Myles adapting to eating solid food instead of energy drinks?
It's very hard, wouldnt mind myself a nice energy drink
If pinch puts triple on corki what percentage is it that you will carry?
100%... The meme is stale STOP
Did you consider replacing Jayke when he upgraded Janna to level 7 mastery?
Missing New Zealand pies Blinky?

I have been struggling to get an answer with this for about 5+ years now.

How does one get around the luck factor of teammates in solo queue?

I want to know exactly how I can bypass having teammates dictate the results of a game, or how I can control them to make the right decisions.
Please Chelby we need wombo combo next game... set team goals... maxibon reward for every successful wombo.
Triple's Corki win rate?
How can this be called the AV ama if Kobe isn't there. Dissapointed
So when are we seeing Myles on anything but Varus?
Free hugs?
At LAN!
How is living and playing league (both matches and soloq) in a gaming house different from playing at home and where do you think you perform better?

Solo queue is basically the same except we have a better setup here!

As for team matches, team houses enable immense growth that would otherwise not be possible in aspects such as in person VOD reviews and addressing issues on the spot. Also, hanging out and living with the team develops the personal relationships between players which are crucial to our overall team growth!
Scrims are better soloq is worse, ideally we would have separate PC's in our rooms/somewhere outside the scrim room but its early days

playing solo q at the house is a nightmare, everyone is super loud and idiotic and i literally cannot focus.
conversely at home i have student net with 4 people abusing it,
i do not know which is worse.
@Ceres will we see any lethality champs top (riven, jayce etc.) since the new buffs or nah

Jayce would be a brilliant lethality champion top, but it has a few matchups that can do ok in lane and outscale Jayce quite hard, along with many other reasons that make him preferable to play mid currently.

as for other lethality champions, GP will be a huge pick top and i don't think riven will picked at all unless pocket pick.

as for friend request, i can't add everyone so i choose to be fair and not add anyone, sorry :)
oh and can you friend req me ;)

Do you think having a pet in the house has helped or hindered the team, and why?

Who is Kobe's favourite AV member that isn't Jayke?
